Package com.mycompany.dietgenerator

Class Validation

java.lang.Object
com.mycompany.dietgenerator.Validation
public class Validation extends Object
Static class containing methods for validation of inputs and error handling.
Author:
kxg708

      public static void showErrorAlert(Exception e)
      Method which creates a pop up which displays error message
      Parameters:

    • showWarningAlert

      public static void showWarningAlert(String message)
      Method which creates a warning pop up with custom message
      Parameters:
      message - the custom message to be displayed

    • createNumeric

      public static void createNumeric(javafx.scene.control.TextField txtFld)
      Method which takes a TextField and adds a property which only allows numeric input. Taken from source: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/7555564/what-is-the-recommended-way-to-make-a-numeric-textfield-in-javafx
      Parameters:
      txtFld - the TextField to which the property is being added

    • isTxtFldEmpty

      public static boolean isTxtFldEmpty(javafx.scene.control.TextField txtFld)
      Method which takes a Text Field and checks whether it is empty. If it is, a warning is displayed.
      Parameters:
      txtFld - The Text Field being checked.
      Returns:
      true if empty, and false if contains text.

    • isTxtFldNumeric

      public static boolean isTxtFldNumeric(javafx.scene.control.TextField txtFld)
      Method which takes a Text Field and checks whether it contains numeric values. If it isn't, a warning is displayed.
      Parameters:
      txtFld - The Text Field being checked.
      Returns:
      true if numeric, and false if contains text.

    • isRdBtnSelected

      public static boolean isRdBtnSelected(javafx.scene.control.ToggleGroup group)
      Method which checks if a radio button from an inputted Toggle Group has been selected or not. If no button is selected a warning is displayed.
      Parameters:
      group - Toggle Group being checked
      Returns:
      true if a button is selected, and false if no radio button is selected
